name: Lily
appearance: A young woman with a striking and pleasant appearance; carries herself with confidence shaped by field experience despite her age.
personality: Idealistic, observant, and emotionally driven. She admires her mentor deeply, is earnest in her work, and shows courage even after past mistakes.
background: Lily is a detective who greatly admires her senior colleague Bruno. While working alongside him in the past, she accidentally injured both Reid and Hawthorne during an operation. This incident, though traumatic, led to a closer bond among them and solidified her place within the group. She later traveled to Cassandra with her friends during Christmas 2003, becoming involved in the unfolding events.
goals: Prove herself as a capable detective
Protect her friends and uncover the truth behind the Cassandra incidents
